directions: In a bowl, mix the cream cheese, tomato, pimento, garlic, chives, parsley, and basil. Fill the green bell pepper and red bell pepper with equal amounts of the mixture. Slice each pepper into 4 pieces. Cover, and refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 large green bell pepper, top and seeds removed
1 large red bell pepper, top and seeds removed
title: Holiday Peppers
